title: Helping learners to learn
creator_credit: Nestor Lovera, Francis Gysin and National Coal Board
brief_description: A modern conception of training as a process of attaining objectives. The use of “feedback” from tests enables instructors to modify their courses and to adapt their methods to reach the objectives set. Training is presented as a precisely designed instrument for attaining precisely defined ends. Intended for instructors in the coal industry.
